name: ux-copy-audit
description: Audit dashboard UX copy, empty states, and affordances; propose fixes.

steps.title: Survey dashboards
steps.description: Walk through tasks, delegation stream, workflow suggestions, settings. Note unclear copy, missing empty/disabled states, and confusing flows.

steps.title: Propose copy/UI tweaks
steps.description: List concrete wording changes and UI adjustments (labels, helper text, button states) with rationale.

steps.title: Highlight critical UX gaps
steps.description: Call out top 3 UX issues impacting user success and suggest next actions.
